Nick Gall wrote:

> I am /not/ seeking 
> to understand what the "principle of generality" as Roy uses it might 
> /mean/; I have my own interpretation of what I think it means and it is 
> very much in line with these excellent comments. Rather, I am seeking to 
> find out where Roy got the principle in the first place.

Why don't you ask him?

cheers
Bill
